Class SpecialVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VendingMachine
SpecialVendingMachine
public class SpecialVendingMachine extends VendingMachine
SpecialVendingMachine extends the VendingMachine class and represents a specialized vending machine capable of handling additional functionalities, such as managing products, processes, and order. It provides methods to add products, set add-on slots, manage processes, find items and slots, handle orders, and set a controller to manage user interactions in the SVM interface. This class is designed to work with a graphical SVM interface managed by SVMcontroller

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialVendingMachine

      public SpecialVendingMachine(String N, Slot[] iS, int c, Slot[] maxA, int maxP)
      Constructor for creating a SpecialVendingMachine object.
      Parameters:
      N - The name of the vending machine.
      iS - The array of item slots in the vending machine.
      c - The capacity of the vending machine.
      maxA - The array of add-on slots in the vending machine.
      maxP - The maximum number of products the vending machine can handle.

    • findSlot

      public int findSlot(int slotNum)
      Overrides the findSlot method from the VendingMachine class. Finds the index of the Slot object associated with the given slot number.
      Overrides:
      findSlot in class VendingMachine
      Parameters:
      slotNum - The slot number for which to find the corresponding Slot.
      Returns:
